attributes.action: Prevent or reduce British based companies from offshoring work undermining U.K. employment opportunities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too many British based companies who offshore work to foreign countries are removing work opportunities from U.K. citizens.
It's understandable from a business cost perspective however if these companies want to be a U.K. company then they should remain British through and through.
Many companies say this is to reduce cost to their consumers however we still see many large businesses increasing their charges regularly.
Keep Britain, British and increase the job market by removing or reducing how much companies based in the U.K. can offshore employment opportunities.
